Advent: Our King and Savior now draws near: Come, let us adore him.
Christmas: Alleluia. To us a child is born: O come, let us adore him. Alleluia.
Epiphany: The Lord has shown forth his glory: Come let us adore him.
Lent: The Lord is full of compassion and mercy: Come let us adore him.
Easter Day until the Ascension: Alleluia. The Lord is risen indeed: Come let us adore him. Alleluia.
Ascension Day until the Day of Pentecost: Alleluia. Christ the Lord has ascended into heaven: Come let us adore him. Alleluia.
Pentecost: Alleluia. The Spirit of the Lord renews the face of the earth: Come let us adore him. Alleluia.
Trinity Sunday: Father, Son, and Holy Spirit, one God: Come let us adore him.
Feasts of the Incarnation in Easter: Alleluia. The Word was made flesh and dwelt among us: Come, let us adore him. Alleluia.
Feasts of the Incarnation other: The Word was made flesh and dwelt among us: Come, let us adore him.
All Saints and other Major Saints' Days: Alleluia. The Lord is glorious in his saints: Come, let us adore him. Alleluia.
The Lord is glorious in his saints: Come, let us adore him.
Other: The earth is the Lord's for he made it: Come let us adore him.
Worship the Lord in the beauty of holiness: Come let us adore him.
The mercy of the Lord is everlasting: Come let us adore him.
